Discovered by the ever-thorough PiunikaWeb, a significant number of iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max owners are reporting the speakers on their phones do not work correctly. Furthermore, it looks like no fix is coming soon.

Curiously, phone calls are not being affected by this issue and this is good news as it strongly suggests the fault is software-related rather than hardware. That said, a fix could take some time as one affected user reports the latest iOS 12.1 beta doesn’t address it.

[url]https://www.forbes.com/sites/gordonkelly/2018/10/04/apple-iphone-xs-max-upgrade-speaker-problem-charging-price-cost-ios12/
[/url]
